messages.message:
TIL you can generate go code coverage simply using
`make test COVERAGE=True OPEN_REPORT=True`

It generates coverage stats like below and opens a page in the browser that lets you see which lines are not covered
```ok  	instabase/jobservice/cronscheduler	31.503s	coverage: 80.1% of statements
ok  	instabase/jobservice/flowlogger	0.427s	coverage: 60.3% of statements
ok  	instabase/jobservice/handler	213.664s	coverage: 74.7% of statements
ok  	instabase/jobservice/modelcontroller	3.099s	coverage: 74.7% of statements
ok  	instabase/jobservice/stats	1.175s	coverage: 60.0% of statements
ok  	instabase/jobservice/taskscheduler	3.235s	coverage: 84.1% of statements
ok  	instabase/jobservice/utils	0.573s	coverage: 0.0% of statements```
